Text: Fabrications from David Irvine, a notorious holocaust denier. He has been successfully pursued in court and shown to be a liar and a fabricator of facts. Historical authorities have denounced his fabrications from one end of the globe to the other. This film continues his quest to defend the poor Nazis who aren't to blame for WWII, at least according to Irvine. A despicable man if there ever was one!

Obviously you haven't seen the documentary.  The fact that you refute nothing specific, shows that you support the lies described. David Irvine's sources were largely from the British archives. You're no Viking, Jew.

The Holocaust was a complete fabrication..the so-called 6 million number was politically arrived at..with no basis in reality. Russian Jews (Bolsheviks) were the ones who had the most influence on this number. Stalin was poisoned in 1952 because he had started his plans to purge the government of jews. Fact
Vikingman...you truly have no clue. Truly
